text: liye paalakon ka unake (asalee) baapon ke naam se pukaara karo yahee khuda ke nazadeek bahut theek hai haan agar tum log unake asalee baapon ko na jaanate ho to tumhaare deenee bhaee aur dost hain (unhen bhaee ya dost kahakar pukaara karo) aur haan isamen bhool chook jao to alabatta usaka tum par koee ilzaam nahin hai magar jab tum dil se jaanaboojh kar karo (to zaroor gunaah hai) aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai.
